# Virtual Event Production Support for SSHRC and NSERC

## Solicitation Details

**Title**: Virtual Event Production Support for Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC) and the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council (NSERC)
**Reference Number**: PW-23-01021768
**Solicitation Number**: NS19798

## Tender Information

* **Closing Date and Time**: 2023-02-27T13:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Publication Date**: 2023-01-17
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-02-24
* **Tender Status**: Exired (Note: The tender has expired, and no further submissions will be accepted.)

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC)
* **Contracting Office Address**: 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A1H5, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC) and NSERC

## Procurement Information

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Region of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Service Description

The Government of Canada is seeking comprehensive virtual event production support services for the SSHRC and NSERC. The selected supplier will provide technical and professional support for livestreaming of public events, bilingual (English and French) simultaneous interpretation, and closed captioning services on an ad-hoc basis.

## Attachment(s)

The tender package includes the following attachments:

* Final Request for Proposal (RFP) document
* Supplier questions and answers (English)
* Supplier questions and answers (French)
* Supplier questions and answers for SSHRC and NSERC (English)
* Supplier questions and answers for SSHRC and NSERC (French)

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* **Name**: Lisa Lacasse
* **Email**: [Lisa.Lacasse@nserc-crsng.gc.ca](mailto:Lisa.Lacasse@nserc-crsng.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: 343-571-9655

Please note that the tender has expired, and no further submissions will be accepted.
